pages.text: $(item)Asparagus$() is a common Vegetable Food item that can be grown by planting $(item)Asparagus Seeds$().$(br)Mature asparagus crops drop 1 to 5 asparaguses with no seeds. Bone Meal can be used on asparaguses.$(br)$(item)Asparagus$() can be used as an ingredient in several $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes and is required for dishes like $(item)Asparagazpacho$() and has a vegetable value of 1 in the recipes.
$(item)Asparagus Seeds$() can be crafted by the $(item)Asparagus$() in the Crafting Table.
